ARABIC: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I do not ask you for any wage for it. My wage is the responsibility of no one but the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I ask no recompense of you for it. My reward is due from none but the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I seek of you no reward for this; my reward is with none but the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I do not ask for any payment for my preaching. I shall receive my reward from the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And I do not ask from you any fee for it; my reward is only upon the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: No reward do I ask of you for it; my reward is only from the Lord of all that exists."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I do not ask you any reward for it; surely my reward is only with the Lord of the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I ask of you no wage for this; my wage falls only upon the Lord of all Being.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I ask of you no wage therefor; my wage is the concern only of the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I ask no recompense of you; my reward is only with the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I ask of you no hire therefor: my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I do not ask you any reward for it; my reward lies only with the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: No reward do I ask of you for it (my Message of Islamic Monotheism), my reward is only from the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns, and all that exists).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For this I ask of you no wage, for my wage falls only on the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I ask of you no payment for this. My payment is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:127] I do not ask of you any reward for this; for my reward lies only with the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I ask of you no wage) no payment (therefore) for professing Allah's divine Oneness; (my wage) my reward (is the concern only of the Lord of the Worlds.
